mapper.select: SELECT zzid, zsid, zzmc, zzlxdm, zzbh, zzbs, zzbfjg, zzbfjgdm, zzbfrq, czzt, czztdm, czztdmlx, czztdmlxdm, zzyxqqsrq, zzyxqjzrq, zzbgsj, zzbgyy, zzqzr, zzqzsj, zzqzmc, cjsj, zzwjlj, zzzt, szzs, bdcqzh, zzlsh, zzqzlj, qzzt, dzqzwybs FROM bdc_dzzz_qzxx WHERE zzid = #{zzid}

SELECT zzid, zsid, zzmc, zzlxdm, zzbh, zzbs, zzbfjg, zzbfjgdm, zzbfrq, czzt, czztdm, czztdmlx, czztdmlxdm, zzyxqqsrq, zzyxqjzrq, zzbgsj, zzbgyy, zzqzr, zzqzsj, zzqzmc, cjsj, zzwjlj, zzzt, szzs, bdcqzh, zzlsh, zzqzlj, qzzt, dzqzwybs FROM bdc_dzzz_zzxx WHERE zsid = #{zsid}

SELECT zzid, zsid, zzmc, zzlxdm, zzbh, zzbs, zzbfjg, zzbfjgdm, zzbfrq, czzt, czztdm, czztdmlx, czztdmlxdm, zzyxqqsrq, zzyxqjzrq, zzbgsj, zzbgyy, zzqzr, zzqzsj, zzqzmc, cjsj, zzwjlj, zzzt, szzs, bdcqzh, zzlsh, zzqzlj, qzzt, dzqzwybs FROM bdc_dzzz_zzxx WHERE bdcqzh = #{bdcqzh}

SELECT zzid, zsid, zzmc, zzlxdm, zzbh, zzbs, zzbfjg, zzbfjgdm, zzbfrq, czzt, czztdm, czztdmlx, czztdmlxdm, zzyxqqsrq, zzyxqjzrq, zzbgsj, zzbgyy, zzqzr, zzqzsj, zzqzmc, cjsj, zzwjlj, zzzt, szzs, bdcqzh, zzlsh, zzqzlj, qzzt, dzqzwybs FROM bdc_dzzz_qzxx WHERE zzbs = #{zzbs}
mapper.update:
UPDATE bdc_dzzz_qzxx t
t.zzwjlj = #{zzwjlj} ,
t.zzqzlj = #{zzqzlj} ,
t.zzqzr = #{zzqzr} ,
t.zzqzsj = #{zzqzsj} ,
t.szzs = #{szzs} ,
t.zzzt = #{zzzt} ,
t.zzbgsj = #{zzbgsj} ,
t.zzbgyy = #{zzbgyy}
t.qzzt = #{qzzt}
WHERE t.zzid = #{zzid}
mapper.select: SELECT c.szsdwdm, c.szsmc mc, SUM(a.zzqf_count) zzqf_count, SUM(a.zzzx_count) zzzx_count FROM (SELECT y.dwdm, SUM(CASE WHEN t.zzzt = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS zzqf_count, SUM(CASE WHEN t.zzzt = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS zzzx_count FROM bdc_dzzz_ywxx y LEFT JOIN bdc_dzzz_zzxx t ON t.zzid = y.zzid GROUP BY y.dwdm ) a LEFT JOIN bdc_dzzz_config c ON a.dwdm = c.dwdm GROUP BY c.szsmc, c.szsdwdm ORDER BY c.szsdwdm
